C-Path 的 TRxA 启动 2024 年拨款以促进下一代疗法Critical Path Institute (C-Path) 转化治疗加速器 (TRxA) 今天宣布了 2024 年全球药物开发突破性研究和创新资助（也称为 BRIDGe）提案征集。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/C-Paths-TRxA-launches-2024-grants-to-boost-next-gen-therapeutics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/C-Paths-TRxA-launches-2024-grants-to-boost-next-gen-therapeutics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08f515f8-8e92-484a-b116-aa48c442f744 Tue, 23 Jan 2024 11:09:17 -0500 C-Path's TRxA launches 2024 grants to boost next-gen therapeutics
研究人员提出了一种帕金森病分类的新模型由克伦比尔脑研究所神经学家和高级科学家 Anthony Lang 博士领导的国际研究小组提出了一种帕金森病 (PD) 分类的新模型。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/Researchers-propose-a-new-model-for-classifying-Parkinsons-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/Researchers-propose-a-new-model-for-classifying-Parkinsons-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=55e53c52-e4a8-4826-902f-60495c4bff8d Tue, 23 Jan 2024 11:04:02 -0500 Researchers propose a new model for classifying Parkinson's disease
非传染性疾病和外部死亡原因是强迫症患者死亡风险的主要原因研究人员调查了患有强迫症（OCD）的瑞典人与匹配的未受影响的个人或兄弟姐妹相比的特定原因和全因死亡的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/Non-communicable-diseases-and-external-causes-of-death-are-major-contributors-to-the-risk-of-mortality-in-强迫症患者.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/Non-communicable-diseases-and-external-causes-of-death-are-major-contributors-to-the-risk-of-mortality-in-强迫症患者.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=efc12bea-8cbd-465d-838e-b75aa09f2ba6 Tue, 23 Jan 2024 10:40:00 -0500 Non-communicable diseases and external causes of death are major contributors to the risk of mortality in people with OCD
我们对慢性、缓慢发生的气候变化对心理健康的影响了解多少？研究人员评估了慢性气候变化对心理健康的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/What-do-we-know-about-the-mental-health-effects-of-chronic-slow-onset-climate-change.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/What-do-we-know-about-the-mental-health-effects-of-chronic-slow-onset-climate-change.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=71db9486-1349-4113-b3b9-d7ab9576945b Tue, 23 Jan 2024 10:14:00 -0500 What do we know about the mental health effects of chronic, slow-onset climate change?
